articles.author: F1
articles.title: FP1: Ricciardo tops first practice in Bahrain as 2024 F1 season officially kicks off - Formula 1
articles.description: Daniel Ricciardo and the rebranded RB team set the pace in the opening free practice session of the 2024 season at the Bahrain International Circuit, leading the way from McLaren pair Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri amid a mixture of run plans.
